ThingDef.label: simple grill
ThingDef.Description: A small grill used to cook meat into simple jerky.

ThingDef.label: butcher table
ThingDef.Description: A heavy table for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat.

ThingDef.label: cook stove
ThingDef.Description: A simple stove and attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: professional cook stove
ThingDef.Description: A professional quality stove and attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: Electric oven
ThingDef.Description: An oven. Needs Power: 50/500W

ThingDef.label: canningstove
ThingDef.Description: A stove for canning foods.

ThingDef.label: Candy Table
ThingDef.Description: Bakes tasty pastries.

ThingDef.label: nutrient paste dispenser
ThingDef.description: Synthesizes nutrient paste from organic feedstocks. It consumes less ingredients and time than any other meal production method - but nobody likes eating nutrient paste.

ThingDef.label: dispenser hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers.

ThingDef.label: Refrigerated Hopper
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for use by machines like nutrient paste dispensers. Uses power to maintain to preserve it's contents.

ThingDef.Label: Soylent Machine
ThingDef.Description: A machine to produce Soylent Green from high energy plankton.

ThingDef.label: brewery
ThingDef.Description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew beer.

ThingDef.label: Entertainment table
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for the preparation finer things.

ThingDef.label: coffee machine
ThingDef.Description: A machine built for the preparation of coffee beans

ThingDef.label: Hand sawmill
ThingDef.Description: A small muscle-powered hand saw for cutting logs into wood planks.

ThingDef.label: Electric sawmill
ThingDef.Description: An electric saw for cutting logs into wood planks.

ThingDef.label: smelting furnace
ThingDef.Description: A wood-fired furnace used for smelting steel into steel bars.

ThingDef.label: electric smelter
ThingDef.Description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes a lot of power.

ThingDef.label: machining table
ThingDef.Description: A table and tools for assembling and disassembling machine components like mechanoids bodies and ammunition.

ThingDef.Label: glassworks table
ThingDef.Description: A table with all the tools you need to make glass.

ThingDef.label: Electronics table
ThingDef.Description: A table with tools for crafting electronic chips.

ThingDef.label: tailor's workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for cloth refinement and clothing production.

ThingDef.label: tailor's loom
ThingDef.Description: A tailor's table used to spin raw materials into usable cloth.

ThingDef.Label: Recycle Textile Bench
ThingDef.Description: A bench to Recycle used Apparel into useable textiles. Recovers 50% of the original material used for the item. Apparel made from more than one resource, will return nothing

ThingDef.label: mending workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped with all the tools required to mend and repair damaged items.

ThingDef.label: Inorganic matter converter
ThingDef.Description: A converter to turn nearly anything into inorganic matter and creates resources.

ThingDef.label: Assembling workbench
ThingDef.Description: A table and tools for assembling constructions and tools.

ThingDef.label: Electric assembling workbench
ThingDef.Description: A electric table and tools for assembling constructions and tools.

ThingDef.label: smithing bench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for weapons and tools production.

ThingDef.label: stonecutter's table
ThingDef.Description: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks.

ThingDef.label: sculptor's table
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.

ThingDef.label: concrete mixer
ThingDef.Description: A concrete mixer.

ThingDef.label: Electric concrete mixer
ThingDef.Description: A electric concrete mixer.

ThingDef.label: Mine extractor
ThingDef.description: This mine extractor, digs deep into the ground and extracts crude oil, metals from the earth.

ThingDef.label: fissure
ThingDef.description: A fissure that cuts deep into the earth.

ThingDef.label: Drilling rig
ThingDef.description: A powerful machine designed to crack open the earth and create a deep fissure which can be used to can access to the lower layers of the planet's crust.

ThingDef.label: Petrochemical plant
ThingDef.Description: Petrochemical plant using chemicals from crude oil as a raw material or feedstock with oil refinery.

ThingDef.label: Oil refinery
ThingDef.Description: An oil refinery is an industrial process plant where crude oil is processed and refined into more useful products.

ThingDef.label: Electronics factory
ThingDef.Description: Electronics factory are industry building, produces integrated circuits, microchip integrated circuits and bioelectronic devices from electronic components.

ThingDef.label: Gas centrifuge
ThingDef.description: A thermal diffusion gas centrifuge is a device that performs isotope separation of gases. A centrifuge relies on the principles of centrifugal force accelerating molecules so that particles of different masses are physically separated in a gradient along the radius of a rotating container. A prominent use of gas centrifuges is for the separation uranium-235 from natural uranium-237.

ThingDef.label: Centrifuge feeder
ThingDef.description: Holds resources for the Gas centrifuge.

ThingDef.label: crematorium
ThingDef.Description: Cremates corpses.

ThingDef.label: research bench
ThingDef.description: Researchers work here to discover new things.

ThingDef.Label: Medical Table
ThingDef.Description: A table to craft medicine!

ThingDef.label: chemlab
ThingDef.Description: A chemical laboratory with all the equipment needed to create medkits, and advanced prosthetics.

ThingDef.label: organ vat
ThingDef.Description: A large vat used to turn human corpses into biomatter, and grow replacement organs.

ThingDef.label: composter
ThingDef.Description: A composter used to turn wood logs into mulch.

ThingDef.label: Weapon Crafting Workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench to produce weapons.

ThingDef.label: Advanced weapon crafting workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench to produce weapons.

ThingDef.label: Mechweapon crafting workbench
ThingDef.Description: A mechanoid workbench to produce futuristic weapons.

ThingDef.label: Ammo crafting table
ThingDef.Description: A ammo crafting table where you can make shells, rockets etc.

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow a few plants quickly. The basin requires power to work, and plants will die if power is cut.

ThingDef.label: Advanced hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow plants quickly. The basin requires power to work, provides their own light source, but plants will die if power is cut.

ThingDef.label: Hydroponic Pod
ThingDef.description: Pot digged into the ground with additonal hydroponic support
